starters.name: Momo (Veg)
starters.description: Famous traditional Nepalese dumplings made with various seasonal vegetables

starters.name: Momo (Chicken)
starters.description: Made with chicken mince and herbs

starters.name: Mixed Platter
starters.description: Includes Onion Bhaji, Chicken Tikka, Seekh Kebab

mixed_grills.name: Galley's Veg Grill
mixed_grills.description: Onion bhaji, mogo, samosas and paneer

mixed_grills.name: Small Mixed Grill
mixed_grills.description: Chicken wings, chicken tikka, sheekh kebab, chicken pakora

mixed_grills.name: Regular Mixed Grill
mixed_grills.description: Same as our small mixed grill plus lamb chops

mixed_grills.name: Large Mixed Grill
mixed_grills.description: Same as our regular mixed grill plus, Kathmandu Tikka and fish pakora

mixed_grills.name: Xtra Large Special Mixed Grill
mixed_grills.description: Same as our large mixed grill plus king prawn

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Kathmandu Tikka (Served in Grill)
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Succulent chicken breast cubes marinated in cheese and cream with a hint of crushed black peppers

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Rack of Lamb
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Lamb chops marinated overnight to give extra softness and tender, cooked in tandoor

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Paneer Saslick
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Soft cheese cooked in tandoor oven served in sizzler with onion and peppers

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Salmon Tikka
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Pieces of salmon flavoured with cumin seeds and chargrilled in tandoor

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Tandoori King Prawn
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: King prawn marinated in nepalese spices and herbs and cooked in tandoor

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Himali Lamb
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Green curry seasoned with Himalayan salt and yoghurt blend with fresh mint, green chilli and Nepalese spice

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Rara King Prawn
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: King prawn cooked in coconut based medium sauce with blend of Nepalese spices, tarmind and mustard

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Lasun Kukhura Khursani (LKK/LLK)
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Tender pieces of chicken cooked with garlic, crushed chilli, spring onions, fresh cream in the chef's special Nepalese sauce

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Khasi Ko Masu (Goat Curry)
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: A rich and flavoursome slow cooked goat on the bone/off the bone with unique blend of Nepalese spices

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Pokhareli Fish Curry
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Another traditional flavourful curry with a hint of mustard, coconut milk, exhilarating

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Chicken Rum Rum
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Must try Nepalese dish. Chicken cooked with himalayan herbs, nepalese black peppers (timur)

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Bhutuwa (chicken/lamb)
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Traditional Nepalese speciality cooked with dried crushed chilli and crushed garlic

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Special Butter Chicken
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: One butter chicken is irresistibility creamy with methi flavour and a hint of chilli. Fancy a mild one? Let us know

old_crown_speciality_dishes.name: Lamb Shank
old_crown_speciality_dishes.description: Absolutely delicious and succulent, this LAMB dish is to die for or shall we say to live for!

notes.allergen_warning: If you have any food allergies, please let us know before you order. Please be aware that although all due care is taken, there is risk of allergen.
notes.bespoke_orders: We can do bespoke order, tell us your spice level.
